title: Advanced Power BI: Expert Data Analysis and Visualization
description: Master Power BI to create insightful data visualizations and perform expert-level data analysis. Learn advanced techniques for data modeling, DAX calculations, and visualization.

title: 30 Days of Angular: Build 30 Projects with Angular
description: Learn Angular by building 30 real-world projects in 30 days. This course covers the basics of Angular, including components, services, and routing.

title: CapCut Video Editing for Viral Shorts: ChatGPT, Elevenlabs
description: Create viral short videos using CapCut with AI tools like ChatGPT and Elevenlabs. Learn advanced video editing techniques and how to use AI to generate captions and subtitles.

title: Practice Exams Foundational Cloud Digital Leader (Google)
description: Prepare for the Google Cloud Digital Leader exam with practice tests. This course covers the basics of cloud computing, including security, networking, and storage.

title: CSS Animation, Javascript Animation, Tailwind for Web Design
description: Enhance your web design skills with CSS and JavaScript animations, using Tailwind. Learn advanced techniques for creating responsive and interactive web pages.

title: Bash Scripting Tutorial – Learn Linux Shell Script
description: Learn the basics of Bash scripting and automate tasks in Linux. This course covers the basics of shell scripting, including variables, conditionals, and loops.

title: Amazon Virtual Assistant for Sellers • Full Course [2025]
description: Become an Amazon Virtual Assistant and help sellers succeed on the platform. Learn advanced techniques for managing inventory, orders, and customer service.

title: Generative AI in Testing: Revolutionize Your QA Processes
description: Leverage generative AI to improve and automate your QA testing processes. Learn advanced techniques for using AI to generate test cases and automate testing.

title: 50 Days of DSA Python Data Structures Algorithms LEETCODE
description: Master data structures and algorithms in Python with this 50-day challenge. Learn advanced techniques for solving problems on LeetCode and improving your coding skills.

title: Complete WhatsApp Marketing Course
description: Learn to leverage WhatsApp for marketing and grow your business. This course covers the basics of WhatsApp marketing, including creating campaigns and managing customer conversations.

title: Become Digital Electronics Master
description: Achieve mastery in digital electronics with comprehensive lessons. Learn advanced techniques for designing and building digital circuits.

title: Create Hyper-Realistic AI Videos Using Prompts & Google Veo3
description: Produce hyper-realistic AI videos using prompts and Google Veo3. Learn advanced techniques for generating videos with AI and improving your video production skills.

title: React for Beginners: Build Your First App
description: Learn the basics of React and build your first app. This course covers the fundamentals of React, including components, state management, and routing.
